extensionDescription.message: Automatically or manually copies vid_id from HydraX / Abyss video server

noIdFound.message: No vid_id found to copy on this page.
noIdFound.description: Message when no ID is found

copyFailedExecCommand.message: Could not manually copy ID (execCommand failed).
copyFailedExecCommand.description: Error message for local copy execCommand

copyFailedPermission.message: Could not manually copy ID. Please allow clipboard access.
copyFailedPermission.description: Error message for local copy permission

invalidUrl.description: Error message for invalid URL when opening keyword link

popupElementNotFound.description: Debugging error when popup element is not found

failedOpenKeywordLink.description: Error message if keyword link fails to open

autoCopySettingSaved.description: Console message when auto-copy setting is saved

autoCopySettingUpdated.description: Console message when auto-copy setting is updated

manualCopyRequest.description: Console message for manual copy request

manualCopyDone.description: Status message for manual copy completion

consoleCopiedToClipboardNavigator.description: Console log for successful navigator.clipboard copy

consoleFailedToCopyNavigator.description: Console log for failed navigator.clipboard copy

consoleNavigatorNotAvailable.message: navigator.clipboard.writeText not available, falling back to execCommand.
consoleNavigatorNotAvailable.description: Console log when navigator.clipboard is not available

consoleErrorWithNavigator.description: Console log for generic navigator.clipboard error

consoleCopiedToClipboardExecCommand.description: Console log for successful execCommand copy

consoleFailedToCopyExecCommand.message: Failed to copy using execCommand (returned false).
consoleFailedToCopyExecCommand.description: Console log for failed execCommand copy

consoleErrorDuringExecCommand.description: Console log for error during execCommand copy

consoleReceivedAutoCopyRequest.message: Received request to auto-copy IDs from tab %s:
consoleReceivedAutoCopyRequest.description: Console log for received auto-copy request

consoleAutoCopyScriptInjected.message: Auto-copy script injected successfully for tab %s.
consoleAutoCopyScriptInjected.description: Console log for successful auto-copy script injection

consoleFailedToInjectAutoCopyScript.message: Failed to inject auto-copy script for tab %s:
consoleFailedToInjectAutoCopyScript.description: Console log for failed auto-copy script injection

consoleKeywordDataLoaded.message: Keyword data loaded and saved to storage.
consoleKeywordDataLoaded.description: Console log for keyword data loading

consoleFailedToLoadKeywordData.description: Console log for failed keyword data load

consoleKeywordDataReloaded.description: Console log for keyword data reload on startup

consoleCouldNotParseUrl.description: Console warning for URL parsing error

consoleNoIdToCopyLocal.description: Console warning when no ID to copy locally

consoleFoundNewIds.description: Console log for finding new IDs

consoleIdsSentToBackground.message: Sent IDs to background to request auto-copy.
consoleIdsSentToBackground.description: Console log for IDs sent to background

consoleAutoCopyOffMessage.message: Auto-copy is OFF. Not auto-copying automatically.
consoleAutoCopyOffMessage.description: Console log when auto-copy is off

consoleAutoCopySettingInitial.description: Console log for initial auto-copy setting

consolePageLoaded.message: Page loaded completely. Performing final scan.
consolePageLoaded.description: Console log when page is fully loaded

consoleOpenedKeywordLink.description: Console log when keyword link is opened

consoleFailedOpenKeywordLink.description: Console log when keyword link fails to open

autoCopyStatusSuccess.description: Console log for auto-copy success status

autoCopyStatusError.description: Console log for auto-copy error status

noIdFoundOrPageUnsupported.message: No vid_id found or this page is not supported.
